info.title: Loyalty
info.description: ### LoyaltyThe Loyalty API enables mapping of partner loyalty and discount cards with associated ABG discounts codes and free options. The API also returns the best discount with the provided passenger(s) information when there is more than one passenger.

/partner.x-amf-description: Partner loyalty and ABG discount lookup data.

schema.title: Loyalty tier lookup information
schema.description: Partner loyalty and discount cards with associated ABG discounts codes and free options.

request_time.description: The time stamp of the request

success.title: Success details
success.description: Success response metadata for all the rest APIs.

code.description: The HTTP status code value

message.description: The HTTP status code message

details.description: Description of the success status

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.description: Transaction details that may be used by your application to identify a request.

system_id.title: Internal correlation  identifier
system_id.description: A unique identifier generated internally by the application to identify the payload and troubleshoot.

loyalty_discounts.title: Loyalty lookup
loyalty_discounts.description: General loyalty lookup information. Acts as a passenger context on request. The response includes Mapped ABG discounts and best discount.

rate_qualifiers.title: Reservation rate qualifiers
rate_qualifiers.description: The information determines/influences the rate of the reservation in the localized currency.

discount.title: Brand Discounts
discount.description: The rental vehicle brand rewards program code (also known as discount code) to be applied to the rate of the reservation.

code.title: Discount code
code.description: The rental vehicle brand discount code. This field can be an Avis Worldwide Discount (AWD), Budget Car Discount (BCD), or a Payless Discount Number (PDN) code.

loyalty.title: Loyalty
loyalty.description: Profile information of the user. The personal brand identification information of the user for the Avis, Budget, or Payless user profile.

program.title: Avis Budget Group loyalty program
program.description: The Avis Budget Group brand loyalty program name. The program can be an Avis Preferred, Avis Preferred Plus, Avis Platinum for Avis brand.

code.title: Loyalty code
code.description: The brand loyalty program code. This can be an Avis wizard number, Budget customer number, or Payless Perks number.

brand.title: Avis Budget Group brand
brand.description: The brand associated with the loyalty program.

coupon.title: Coupon
coupon.description: Coupon infomation for reservation discounts and benefits.

code.title: Coupon code
code.description: The coupon code to be applied to the reservation rate.

type.title: Coupon type
type.description: The type of coupon that corresponds to the coupon code.

description.title: Coupon description
description.description: Description of the coupon code that was specified in the request.
description.example: 25USD Off with Rental of CSS/Paperless Coupon

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of coupon codes to apply to the reservation.

coupon_applied.title: Coupon applied flag
coupon_applied.description: Indicates that a coupon code is valid and was successfully applied for the reservation.

coupon_amount.title: Coupon amount
coupon_amount.description: The amount of the coupon discount applied to the cost of the reservation.

coupon_extras.title: Coupon extras
coupon_extras.description: The ancillary products tied to the coupon. For example, if the coupon code specified in the request applies to the cost of a child safety seat, then CSS will be returned in this field.

items.title: Rental Extras
items.description: The ancillary products, special equipment, and other extras selected as part of reservation.

type.title: Extras type
type.description: The type of ancillary product specified in the request. If a code of child safety seat (CSS) is specified in the request, then a value of SPEC_EQUIP will be returned in the response.

code.title: Extras code
code.description: The rental ancillary code used to identify and add rental vehicle equipment and features to the reservation (such as GPS).

quantity.title: Extras quantity
quantity.description: The number of ancillary products to add to the reservation. For example, if a value of 2 is specified for quantity, and a code of CSS, then two child safety seats will be added to the reservation.

amount.title: Extra product amount
amount.description: The price of the ancillary product.

total_owed.title: Total amount of the extra product
total_owed.description: The total price of the ancillary product for the entirety of the reservation period.

membership.title: Frequent Traveler Programs (FTPs)
membership.description: The Frequent Traveler Program (FTP) to be applied to the reservation. This entitles the user the opportunity to earn miles or points with ABG partners, such as airlines, hotels and other select companies. For example, the Lufthansa Miles & More Rewards Program. Surcharges may apply.

code.title: Frequent Traveler Program number
code.description: The unique Frequent Traveler Program (FTP) number of the traveler.

age.title: Age
age.description: Driver’s age. This might influence the rates. Will be superseded by date of birth found in the profile provided in “membership_code”.

date_of_birth.title: Date of Birth
date_of_birth.description: Driver’s date of birth. This might influence the rates. Will be superseded by “age” parameter or date of birth found in the profile provided in “membership_code”

partner_loyalty.title: Partner Loyalty
partner_loyalty.description: The partner loyalty discount program. The partner loyalty to be applied to drive the rate of booking.

program.title: Partner Program Name
program.description: Valid partner loyalty program from the user request, as agreed by partner integration.

partner_discount.title: Partner Discount
partner_discount.description: The partner commercial discount program. The discount to be applied to drive the rate of the booking.

program.title: Commercial Discount Name
program.description: Valid partner discount name from the user request, as agreed by partner integration.

mapped_discounts.title: Mapped discounts
mapped_discounts.description: Mapped Avis Budget Group discounts along with their free options.

items.title: Commercial discount
items.description: The commercial rental vehicle brand rewards program code (also known as discount code). The discounts applied to the rate of the reservation.

brand.title: The Avis, Budget, or Payless brand name.
brand.description: ABG supported brand names like Avis, Budget, or Payless..

code.title: Discount code
code.description: The rental vehicle brand discount code. This field can be an Avis Worldwide Discount (AWD), Budget Car Discount (BCD), or a Payless Discount Number (PDN) code.

percent.title: Discount percentage
percent.description: The discount percentage applied to the reservation.

free_options.title: Free options
free_options.description: Eligible free ancillary products and benefits offered.

quantity.title: Eligible extras quantity
quantity.description: The total number of ancillary products.

items.title: Extras code
items.description: The rental ancillary code used to identify and add rental vehicle equipment and features to the reservation (such as GPS).

meet_and_greet.title: Meet and Greet
meet_and_greet.description: Indicates the free meet and greet feature for the brand.

pickup_date_range.title: Pickup date range
pickup_date_range.description: Pickup date range for the eligibility of promotional discounts.

to.title: To date
to.description: End date for the data range in ISO 8601 representation.

from.title: From date
from.description: Start date for the date range ISO 8601 representation.

dropoff_date_range.title: Dropoff date range
dropoff_date_range.description: Dropoff date range for eligibility of the promotional discounts.

to.title: To date
to.description: End date for the data range in ISO 8601 representation.

from.title: From date
from.description: Start date for the date range ISO 8601 representation.

reservation_date_range.title: Booking date range
reservation_date_range.description: Boking date range for the promotional discounts.

to.title: To date
to.description: End date for the data range in ISO 8601 representation.

from.title: From date
from.description: Start date for the date range ISO 8601 representation.

best_discount.title: Best discount
best_discount.description: Represent the best discount with the provided passenger(s) information when there is more than one passenger.

driver.title: Driver of the vehicle
driver.description: Indicator to represent the primary or secondary driver of the vehicle.

info.title: Stations
info.description: ### Stations The Stations API enables CRUD operation on partner station along with the mapping of partner station code with associated ABG station codes for various brands. This API also returns additional details like working hours and holiday details for partner and ABG locations.

info.title: Meet and greet
info.description:
### Meet and Greet 

Some of the ABG stations serve "meet and greet" functionality to the customer. 

API takes partner station codes as a reference and returns the ABG station codes and meet and greet related attributes.

* "Meet and Greet" provisions revised pickup and dropoff date and supported ABG car class codes which allow the user to customize the selection.
* This feature allows ABG to serve the customers in non-working hours.
* This object contains key_pickup location and parking remarks which can help the user to pick up the keys and the vehicle from the SNCF train station. 
* API will return a success response only if "revised date-time" available for the requested location.

info.title: Personalization
info.description:
### Personalization 

Personalization API will recommend cars to the users based on the number of passengers travelling in a group. 
Passenger’s age & loyalty/commercial card mapping will be used as additional parameters to determine the best offers. 

  * Display the best offers based on the personalization rules. 
  *	A user will be provided with below three options irrespective of brand:
    *	Lead Recommendation
    *	Primary Trade up
    * Secondary Trade up
  *	Input to the personalization request will be:
    *	Partner specific default car groups for a non MAD booking
    *	“Meet & Greet” specific car groups for a MAD booking

items.description: Identifying information about the vehicle, including vehicle category (make/model), features, luggage capacity and the total cost.

category.description: Identifying information and details about the rental vehicle.

sipp_code.description: Standard Interline Passenger Procedure (SIPP) code of the vehicle. A compact 4 door manual air conditioned car will have a SIPP Code CMDR.

vehicle_class_code.description: The vehicle class code used to identify individual cars and trucks according to size, axle numbers and type.

vehicle_class_name.title: Vehicle class name
vehicle_class_name.description: The name of the vehicle class.

features.description: Vehicle equipment and available features (such as bluetooth connectivity).

abs.title: Anti-lock Braking System
abs.description: Indicates whether the anti-lock braking system (ABS) is present in the ABG car or not.

air_bag.title: Air bag
air_bag.description: Indicates whether the airbag restrainst system is present in the ABG car or not.

air_conditioned.title: Air conditioned
air_conditioned.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is air conditioned or not.

bluetooth_equipped.title: Bluetooth
bluetooth_equipped.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is equipped with bluetooth connectivity.

smoke_free.title: Smokefree
smoke_free.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is a smoke-free vehicle.

connected_car.title: Connected car
connected_car.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is equipped with Connected Car technology (which generally includes Internet access and a wireless local area network).

drivetrain.title: Drivetrain
drivetrain.description: Indicates the drive type of the vehicle. This could be either front/rear 2-wheel drive or 4-wheel drive.

radio.title: Radio
radio.description: Indicates the availability of radio af/fm feature in the vehicle.

music.title: Music system
music.description: Indicates the availability of music system in the vehicle.

cruise.title: Cruise control
cruise.description: This flag indicates whether ABG vehicle has cruise (speed control system)  or not.

gps.title: GPS
gps.description: Availability of inbuilt Geo positioning system (GPS) in the vehicle.

central_lock.title: Central lock
central_lock.description: Flag to indicate the central locking feature of ABG car.

capacity.title: Vehicle Capacity
capacity.description: Rental vehicle passenger seat and luggage capacity information.

seats.description: The number of passenger seats in the rental vehicle.

mpg.description: Miles per gallon (MPG) of the vehicle.

large_suitcase.description: The number of large suitcases that can be accommodated in the rental vehicle.

small_suitcase.description: The number of small suitcases that can be accommodated in the rental vehicle.

brand.title: The Avis, Budget, or Payless brand name.
brand.description: ABG supported brand names like Avis, Budget, or Payless..

rate_totals.title: Rates and Totals
rate_totals.description: The fees, rates, and discounts applied to the reservation, with a breakdown of the reservation total.

rate.title: Reservation Rates
rate.description: The reservation rate qualifiers. They determine the rate of the reservation in the localized currency.

currency.description: This indicates the localized currency which determines the vehicle rates. It depends on the rental vehicle pick-up/drop-off location.

rate_code.title: Vehicle Rate Code
rate_code.description: The rental vehicle rate code is used to determine the rate of the rental vehicle reservation.

location_code.description: 3-5 character alphanumeric location or airport code.

coupon_applied.description: Indicates that a coupon discount was successfully applied for the reservation.

discount_applied.description: Indicates that a discount was successfully applied for the reservation.

discount_amount.description: The amount of the  discount applied to the cost of the reservation.

coupon.title: Coupon
coupon.description: Coupon infomation for reservation discounts and benefits.

code.title: Coupon code
code.description: The coupon code to be applied to the reservation rate.

type.title: Coupon type
type.description: The type of coupon that corresponds to the coupon code.

description.title: Coupon description
description.description: Description of the coupon code that was specified in the request.
description.example: 25USD Off with Rental of CSS/Paperless Coupon

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of coupon codes to apply to the reservation.

coupon_applied.title: Coupon applied flag
coupon_applied.description: Indicates that a coupon code is valid and was successfully applied for the reservation.

coupon_amount.title: Coupon amount
coupon_amount.description: The amount of the coupon discount applied to the cost of the reservation.

coupon_extras.title: Coupon extras
coupon_extras.description: The ancillary products tied to the coupon. For example, if the coupon code specified in the request applies to the cost of a child safety seat, then CSS will be returned in this field.

items.title: Rental Extras
items.description: The ancillary products, special equipment, and other extras selected as part of reservation.

type.title: Extras type
type.description: The type of ancillary product specified in the request. If a code of child safety seat (CSS) is specified in the request, then a value of SPEC_EQUIP will be returned in the response.

code.title: Extras code
code.description: The rental ancillary code used to identify and add rental vehicle equipment and features to the reservation (such as GPS).

quantity.title: Extras quantity
quantity.description: The number of ancillary products to add to the reservation. For example, if a value of 2 is specified for quantity, and a code of CSS, then two child safety seats will be added to the reservation.

amount.title: Extra product amount
amount.description: The price of the ancillary product.

total_owed.title: Total amount of the extra product
total_owed.description: The total price of the ancillary product for the entirety of the reservation period.

partner_loyalty.title: Partner Loyalty
partner_loyalty.description: The partner loyalty discount program. The partner loyalty to be applied to drive the rate of booking.

program.title: Partner Program Name
program.description: Valid partner loyalty program from the user request, as agreed by partner integration.

partner_discount.description: The partner commercial discount program. The discount to be applied to drive the rate of the booking.

program.title: Commercial Discount Name
program.description: Valid partner discount name from the user request, as agreed by partner integration.

discount.title: Brand Discounts
discount.description: The rental vehicle brand rewards program code (also known as discount code) to be applied to the rate of the reservation.

code.title: Discount code
code.description: The rental vehicle brand discount code. This field can be an Avis Worldwide Discount (AWD), Budget Car Discount (BCD), or a Payless Discount Number (PDN) code.

membership.title: Frequent Traveler Programs (FTPs)
membership.description: The Frequent Traveler Program (FTP) to be applied to the reservation. This entitles the user the opportunity to earn miles or points with ABG partners, such as airlines, hotels and other select companies. For example, the Lufthansa Miles & More Rewards Program. Surcharges may apply.

code.title: Frequent Traveler Program number
code.description: The unique Frequent Traveler Program (FTP) number of the traveler.

loyalty.title: Loyalty
loyalty.description: Profile information of the user. The personal brand identification information of the user for the Avis, Budget, or Payless user profile.

program.title: Avis Budget Group loyalty program
program.description: The Avis Budget Group brand loyalty program name. The program can be an Avis Preferred, Avis Preferred Plus, Avis Platinum for Avis brand.

code.title: Loyalty code
code.description: The brand loyalty program code. This can be an Avis wizard number, Budget customer number, or Payless Perks number.

brand.title: Avis Budget Group brand
brand.description: The brand associated with the loyalty program.

days.description: The number of days of the reservation.

hours.title: Hour
hours.description: The number of hours of the reservation (after days).

amount.description: The reservation rate of the rental vehicle.

taxes_fees.title: Rental Taxes & Fees
taxes_fees.description: All available rental taxes and fees applied to the reservation.

items.title: Rental Taxes
items.description: Taxes applied to the reservation in the localized currency.

type.description: The type of taxation to be applied.

amount.description: The cost of taxes for the reservation.

items.title: Fee
items.description: Fees applied to the reservation. All available fees and surcharges are returned in the response. Some of these fees are included in the rate, and others are for information purposes only, as they may apply but are not included in the total tax amount.

name.description: The name of the type of fee(s) applied.

pay_now.title: Pay Now amounts
pay_now.description: The Pay Now vehicle amount and estimated amount for the entire duration of the rental.

vehicle_total.description: Vehicle cost for the rental period.

reservation_total.description: Estimated rental cost for the period inclusive of all taxes and fees.

original_vehicle_total.description: Original Vehicle cost for the rental period.

original_reservation_total.description: Original Estimated rental cost for the period inclusive of all taxes and fees.

pay_later.title: Pay Later amounts
pay_later.description: The Pay Later vehicle amount and estimated amount for the entire duration of the rental.

vehicle_total.description: Vehicle cost for the rental period.

reservation_total.description: Estimated rental cost for the period inclusive of all taxes and fees.

original_vehicle_total.description: Original Vehicle cost for the rental period.

original_reservation_total.description: Original Estimated rental cost for the period inclusive of all taxes and fees.

totals.title: Totals
totals.description: The total reservation rate, taxes and fees for the entirety of the reservation.

vehicle_total.description: Total cost of the rental vehicle.

original_vehicle_total.description: Original total cost of the rental vehicle.

original_reservation_total.description: Original total cost of the reservation.

taxes_fees_total.description: Total cost of the combined taxes and fees for the reservation.

extras_total.description: Total cost of the specified ancillary products (such as GPS).

insurance_total.description: Total cost of the specified rental insurance coverage.

discount_total.description: Total discount to be applied to the total cost in reservation_total.

passengers.title: Passengers List Details
passengers.description: Passenger(s) attributes like loyalty, discount and age.

rate_qualifiers.title: Rate Qualifiers
rate_qualifiers.description: The information determines/influences the rate of the reservation in the localized currency.

date_of_birth.title: Date of Birth
date_of_birth.description: Driver’s date of birth. This might influence the rates. Will be superseded by “age” parameter or date of birth found in the profile provided in “membership_code”

discount.title: Brand Discounts
discount.description: The rental vehicle brand rewards program code (also known as discount code) to be applied to the rate of the reservation.

code.title: Discount code
code.description: The rental vehicle brand discount code. This field can be an Avis Worldwide Discount (AWD), Budget Car Discount (BCD), or a Payless Discount Number (PDN) code.

age.title: Age
age.description: Driver’s age. This might influence the rates. Will be superseded by date of birth found in the profile provided in “membership_code”.

loyalty.title: Loyalty
loyalty.description: Profile information of the user. The personal brand identification information of the user for the Avis, Budget, or Payless user profile.

program.title: Avis Budget Group loyalty program
program.description: The Avis Budget Group brand loyalty program name. The program can be an Avis Preferred, Avis Preferred Plus, Avis Platinum for Avis brand.

code.title: Loyalty code
code.description: The brand loyalty program code. This can be an Avis wizard number, Budget customer number, or Payless Perks number.

brand.title: Avis Budget Group brand
brand.description: The brand associated with the loyalty program.

membership.title: Frequent Traveler Programs (FTPs)
membership.description: The Frequent Traveler Program (FTP) to be applied to the reservation. This entitles the user the opportunity to earn miles or points with ABG partners, such as airlines, hotels and other select companies. For example, the Lufthansa Miles & More Rewards Program. Surcharges may apply.

code.title: Frequent Traveler Program number
code.description: The unique Frequent Traveler Program (FTP) number of the traveler.

partner_loyalty.title: Partner Loyalty
partner_loyalty.description: The partner loyalty discount program. The partner loyalty to be applied to drive the rate of booking.

program.title: Partner Program Name
program.description: Valid partner loyalty program from the user request, as agreed by partner integration.

partner_discount.title: Partner Discount
partner_discount.description: The partner commercial discount program. The discount to be applied to drive the rate of the booking.

program.title: Commercial Discount Name
program.description: Valid partner discount name from the user request, as agreed by partner integration.

coupon.title: Coupon
coupon.description: Coupon infomation for reservation discounts and benefits.

code.title: Coupon code
code.description: The coupon code to be applied to the reservation rate.

type.title: Coupon type
type.description: The type of coupon that corresponds to the coupon code.

description.title: Coupon description
description.description: Description of the coupon code that was specified in the request.
description.example: 25USD Off with Rental of CSS/Paperless Coupon

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of coupon codes to apply to the reservation.

coupon_applied.title: Coupon applied flag
coupon_applied.description: Indicates that a coupon code is valid and was successfully applied for the reservation.

coupon_amount.title: Coupon amount
coupon_amount.description: The amount of the coupon discount applied to the cost of the reservation.

coupon_extras.title: Coupon extras
coupon_extras.description: The ancillary products tied to the coupon. For example, if the coupon code specified in the request applies to the cost of a child safety seat, then CSS will be returned in this field.

items.title: Rental Extras
items.description: The ancillary products, special equipment, and other extras selected as part of reservation.

type.title: Extras type
type.description: The type of ancillary product specified in the request. If a code of child safety seat (CSS) is specified in the request, then a value of SPEC_EQUIP will be returned in the response.

code.title: Extras code
code.description: The rental ancillary code used to identify and add rental vehicle equipment and features to the reservation (such as GPS).

quantity.title: Extras quantity
quantity.description: The number of ancillary products to add to the reservation. For example, if a value of 2 is specified for quantity, and a code of CSS, then two child safety seats will be added to the reservation.

amount.title: Extra product amount
amount.description: The price of the ancillary product.

total_owed.title: Total amount of the extra product
total_owed.description: The total price of the ancillary product for the entirety of the reservation period.

driver.title: Driver of the vehicle
driver.description: Indicator to represent the primary or secondary driver of the vehicle.

best_discount.title: Best discount
best_discount.description: Represent the best discount with the provided passenger(s) information when there is more than one passenger.

id.description: The transaction identifier used to identify and troubleshoot a given request.

code.title: Partner code
code.description: The organization or entity code registered and obtained through partner onboarding process.

name.title: Partner name
name.description: The organization or entity name registered and obtained through partner onboarding process.

iata_number.title: Partner IATA number
iata_number.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) number. This is an identifier used by travel agents that allows the rental car company to pay the agent a commission for the rental.

language.title: Language
language.description: 2-character ISO 639-1 Language Code. Default language will be picked up based on the partner configuration when there is no language provided in the request.

channel.title: Consumer channel
channel.description: Consumer channel information. This information could be used for personalization whenever applicable. website - Standard website accessed by the end user agent_tool - Agent tool used by travel agent / Call centres / retailers mobile_app - Native mobile app accessed by the end user

recommendations.title: Offer Details
recommendations.description: The rental vehicle availability offerings including the rates, discounts and benefits

brand.title: The Avis, Budget, or Payless brand name.
brand.description: ABG supported brand names like Avis, Budget, or Payless..

vehicle.title: Rental Vehicle Information
vehicle.description: Identifying information about the vehicle, including vehicle category (make/model), features, luggage capacity and the total cost.

category.title: Vehicle Product Details
category.description: Identifying information and details about the rental vehicle.

sipp_code.title: Vehicle SIPP Code
sipp_code.description: Standard Interline Passenger Procedure (SIPP) code of the vehicle. A compact 4 door manual air conditioned car will have a SIPP Code CMDR.

vehicle_class_code.title: Vehicle class code
vehicle_class_code.description: The vehicle class code used to identify individual cars and trucks according to size, axle numbers and type.

vehicle_class_name.title: Vehicle class name
vehicle_class_name.description: The name of the vehicle class.

features.title: Vehicle Features
features.description: Vehicle equipment and available features (such as bluetooth connectivity).

abs.title: Anti-lock Braking System
abs.description: Indicates whether the anti-lock braking system (ABS) is present in the ABG car or not.

air_bag.title: Air bag
air_bag.description: Indicates whether the airbag restrainst system is present in the ABG car or not.

air_conditioned.title: Air conditioned
air_conditioned.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is air conditioned or not.

bluetooth_equipped.title: Bluetooth
bluetooth_equipped.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is equipped with bluetooth connectivity.

smoke_free.title: Smokefree
smoke_free.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is a smoke-free vehicle.

connected_car.title: Connected car
connected_car.description: Indicates that the rental vehicle is equipped with Connected Car technology (which generally includes Internet access and a wireless local area network).

drivetrain.title: Drivetrain
drivetrain.description: Indicates the drive type of the vehicle. This could be either front/rear 2-wheel drive or 4-wheel drive.

radio.title: Radio
radio.description: Indicates the availability of radio af/fm feature in the vehicle.

music.title: Music system
music.description: Indicates the availability of music system in the vehicle.

cruise.title: Cruise control
cruise.description: This flag indicates whether ABG vehicle has cruise (speed control system)  or not.

gps.title: GPS
gps.description: Availability of inbuilt Geo positioning system (GPS) in the vehicle.

central_lock.title: Central lock
central_lock.description: Flag to indicate the central locking feature of ABG car.

capacity.title: Vehicle Capacity
capacity.description: Rental vehicle passenger seat and luggage capacity information.

seats.description: The number of passenger seats in the rental vehicle.

mpg.description: Miles per gallon (MPG) of the vehicle.

large_suitcase.description: The number of large suitcases that can be accommodated in the rental vehicle.

small_suitcase.description: The number of small suitcases that can be accommodated in the rental vehicle.

brand.title: The Avis, Budget, or Payless brand name.
brand.description: ABG supported brand names like Avis, Budget, or Payless..

rate_totals.title: Rates and Totals
rate_totals.description: The fees, rates, and discounts applied to the reservation, with a breakdown of the reservation total.

rate.title: Reservation Rates
rate.description: The reservation rate qualifiers. They determine the rate of the reservation in the localized currency.

currency.description: This indicates the localized currency which determines the vehicle rates. It depends on the rental vehicle pick-up/drop-off location.

rate_code.title: Vehicle Rate Code
rate_code.description: The rental vehicle rate code is used to determine the rate of the rental vehicle reservation.

location_code.description: 3-5 character alphanumeric location or airport code.

coupon_applied.description: Indicates that a coupon discount was successfully applied for the reservation.

under_age_fee_applied.title: Under age fee indicator
under_age_fee_applied.description: This field indicates the young driver fee applicability to the vehicle rate.

coupon_amount.description: The amount of the coupon discount applied to the cost of the reservation.

discount_applied.description: Indicates that a discount was successfully applied for the reservation.

discount_amount.description: The amount of the  discount applied to the cost of the reservation.

promotion_discounts.description: Avis Budget Group seasonal discounts available for the partner.

items.title: Commercial discount
items.description: The commercial rental vehicle brand rewards program code (also known as discount code). The discounts applied to the rate of the reservation.

brand.title: The Avis, Budget, or Payless brand name.
brand.description: ABG supported brand names like Avis, Budget, or Payless..

code.description: The rental vehicle brand discount code. This field can be an Avis Worldwide Discount (AWD), Budget Car Discount (BCD), or a Payless Discount Number (PDN) code.

percent.title: Discount percentage
percent.description: The discount percentage applied to the reservation.

free_options.title: Free options
free_options.description: Eligible free ancillary products and benefits offered.

quantity.title: Eligible extras quantity
quantity.description: The total number of ancillary products.

items.title: Extras code
items.description: The rental ancillary code used to identify and add rental vehicle equipment and features to the reservation (such as GPS).

meet_and_greet.title: Meet and Greet
meet_and_greet.description: Indicates the free meet and greet feature for the brand.

promotion_discounts.description: Avis Budget Group seasonal discounts available for the partner.

items.title: Commercial discount
items.description: The commercial rental vehicle brand rewards program code (also known as discount code). The discounts applied to the rate of the reservation.

brand.title: The Avis, Budget, or Payless brand name.
brand.description: ABG supported brand names like Avis, Budget, or Payless..

code.title: Discount code
code.description: The rental vehicle brand discount code. This field can be an Avis Worldwide Discount (AWD), Budget Car Discount (BCD), or a Payless Discount Number (PDN) code.

percent.title: Discount percentage
percent.description: The discount percentage applied to the reservation.

free_options.title: Free options
free_options.description: Eligible free ancillary products and benefits offered.

quantity.title: Eligible extras quantity
quantity.description: The total number of ancillary products.

items.title: Extras code
items.description: The rental ancillary code used to identify and add rental vehicle equipment and features to the reservation (such as GPS).

meet_and_greet.title: Meet and Greet
meet_and_greet.description: Indicates the free meet and greet feature for the brand.

pickup_date_range.title: Pickup date range
pickup_date_range.description: Pickup date range for the eligibility of promotional discounts.
